column1: Smoque BBQ////My standard orders are usually brisket or St Louis ribs (sooo good!). The brisket is so tender that when you try to pick up a slice with your fork
column2: it will fall apart if you don't get it into your mouth quickly enough. And friends that I have gone with also speak fondly of their pulled pork (personally I have never tried it)
column3: and when I feel like something else besides red meat
column4: I go for their chicken. I know most people might think
column5: "Chicken? Really? If I'm going to get BBQ
column6: I'm getting red meat." Well I've been here enough to want to change it up from time to time
column7: and their chicken is EXCELLENT. Easily some of the juiciest
column8: most flavorful chicken I have even tasted.
